name: obsidian-granola-importer
description: Import your Granola notes into Obsidian with perfect formatting preservation

scripts.analyze: node esbuild.config.mjs production --metafile=meta.json && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const meta=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('meta.json')); const inputSize=Object.values(meta.inputs).reduce((acc,i)=>acc+i.bytes,0); const outputSize=fs.statSync('main.js').size; console.log('Bundle size:', outputSize, 'bytes'); console.log('Dependencies:', Object.keys(meta.inputs).length, 'files'); console.log('Size reduction:', inputSize-outputSize, 'bytes (' + Math.round((1-outputSize/inputSize)*100) + '% smaller)');"
scripts.perf: npm run analyze && npm audit --audit-level moderate
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json

author: amittell
